org.apache.lenya.cms.scheduler
Class TaskJob

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lenya.cms.scheduler.ServletJob
      org.apache.lenya.cms.scheduler.TaskJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.quartz.Job
public class TaskJob
extends ServletJob

A TaskJob is a Job that executes a Task. The task ID is obtained from the task-id request parameter.

Author:
Andreas Hartmann
